title: Coughing tiger at the Bronx Zoo tests positive for coronavirus, a ‘first case of its kind’ in U.S. - Washington Post
description: Coughing tiger at the Bronx Zoo tests positive for coronavirus, a ‘first case of its kind’ in U.S. Washington Post Tiger at New York's Bronx Zoo tests positive for COVID-19 The Sun Tiger at Bronx Zoo Tests Positive for Coronavirus PEOPLE Bronx Zoo tiger tests…
content:
The Wildlife Conservation Society, which runs the Bronx Zoo, said it wanted to test Nadia out of an abundance of caution, hoping to ensure any knowledge we gain about COVID-19 will contribute to the worlds continuing understanding of this novel coronavirus.
